I love growing sunflowers
i m in love with adam levine.
I'm going to miss the sun and the beach, but I'm ready to focus on my studies.
I enjoy spending time with my German Shepherd, as he helps me to relax and forget about my inner critic.
I once spent a week in a cabin in the mountains in the middle of winter and loved every minute of it.

participant_2.background:
My power tools are my most valued material possessions because they allow me to express my creativity and make my home a better place.
I have a dog named Snowball who keeps me company when I'm recovering from my knee surgery.
I like to watch The Repair Shop when I need some inspiration for my own car repairs.
I fear that I will not be able to help my patients as well as I want to.
i hate tomatoes.

content.text: I love growing sunflowers. I find them so beautiful and they are a great source of food for the bees.
I've never grown sunflowers before, but they do sound beautiful. I'm more of a vegetable gardener myself.
What vegetables do you like to grow? I love growing tomatoes, but they can be a bit tricky.
I hate tomatoes! They are the only vegetable I don't like. I love growing carrots, peppers, and cucumbers.
I've never grown cucumbers before, but I love them in salads. What do you like to do with your cucumbers?
I love pickling cucumbers! They are so delicious and they make a great snack.
I've never pickled anything before, but I might have to try that. It sounds delicious.
It's really easy to do and it's a lot of fun. You should definitely give it a try!
I will! Thanks for the suggestion. What else do you like to do in your spare time?
I love to watch The Repair Shop. It's a great show about people who restore old furniture and other items.
I love that show too! It's so inspiring to see people take something old and make it new again.
Me too! It's a great reminder that anything is possible if you put your mind to it.
That's a great attitude to have. I'm going to try to be more like that in the future.
I'm sure you will! You seem like a very positive person.
Thank you! I try to be
